name: Astropicoftheday
0:
”Alexa, ask astro pic to show me the photo of the day”
”Alexa, ask astro pic to give me the photo from friday”
”Alexa, ask astro pic to show me the picture from the 22nd of march 2020”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: astro pic
des: Astropic will show you the current astronomic photo/video from NASA. If today's picture is under copyright, a random other day will be picked. You can also ask for specific dates, like your birthdate. Alexa will read you the given description of the photo.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
